item.description:
Boston Couples!

Are you into BBQ? How about joining us at the Phantom Gourmet's BBQ Beach Party this Sunday at Suffolk Downs?

This should be a great event with BBQ pit masters from around the world competing and sharing thier food with the people of Boston.

The doors open at Noon. Let's meet inside at 12:30 (so that everyone has a chance to gain entry). We'll meet just inside the entrance, however, I'm not sure what the layout will be so bring my phone # 720-233-6969 and txt me when you get in (just in case they are pushing crowds away from there).

Event Website: http://bbq.phantomgou...

Entry price: $5 (but if you buy it online for a limited time you get 2 for 1)
Parking: Free at Suffolk Downs! 111 Waldemar Ave., East Boston, MA
Approximate food prices?
- Rib Sampler 8
- Half Rack 12
- Full Dinner 18
- Desserts 5
- Beer 6
- Water 3
- Soda 4
- Wine 6
- Sandwich 7
- Beverages cash only. Not all food vendors accept credit cards. ATM is available on site.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet just inside the entrance. Bring my phone # 720-233-6969 and txt me when you get in so we're sure to find each other.
item.name: Phantom Gourmet BBQ Beach Party
